name: Volcano
description:
Volcano 🌋 
2021 Generative Art Explorations.
—

Volcanoes represent a transformative reminder of natural events. Volcanoes destroy when they erupt, but they're also responsible for creating new landscapes. Volcanoes exist to remind us that an inevitable human connection with nature still exists no matter how much progress our species achieves.
—

Inspiration for all my work comes from the limits we impose around ourselves and how we push everything we do, many times around the lines of converting things into astonishing visual chaos.
—

Size: 5,000px by 5,000px
Format: PNG Image
